runs.comm: stays behind the line and taps it towards point and sets off, good bounce
gets across and gently taps it wide of second slip and takes the single very easily
hits the deck hard and the ball fizzes past Masakadza who doesn't offer a shot
very tame dismissal, Vinay hits the deck hard and directs it towards the body, Masakadza isn't quick enough to fend it off and instead the ball lobs towards Raina at extra cover
drops it towards silly point and thinks of setting off for a single but it sent back, the fielder dives and underarms the ball, good fielding
tucked to the on side and Ashwin runs across to short square leg and cuts it off
swings it away and he steers it towards backward point, Kohli flings himself to his left but can't cut it off
lands it on a fullish length outside off and he safely shoulders arms
bangs it short this time and Taylor moves across his stumps to pull but the ball fizzes past the glove, stifled appeal
gets away movement, he taps it towards point
that costs India, he oversteps, Dinda overpitches on middle and off and Taylor scoops him comfortably over mid-on and midwicket
Awesome straight drive, full in length outside off and he moves across slightly and whams it though the line, the ball scorches past mid-off
gets across and taps it towards gully

big appeal! Chibhabha tries to pull a short ball outside off and the ball deflects off his shoulder and Ojha does well to fall to his right and take it, they think he hit it but good decision by Tiffen
exactly what he was trying to do the previous ball, pulls a short ball from outside off and he clears midwicket
Chibhabha's tonking it! Short agaun outside off and Chibhabha walked a couple of paces down and socked it over wide long-on
opens the face and dabs it wide of gully
Taylor joins the fun, the ball is pitched up on middle and off and he clears his back leg, makes a bit of room and slams it towards the sight screen
Vinay has his revenge after being caned! Fullish in length on middle and leg, Taylor moves right across his stumps to flick it away, no bat involved, plumb as ever
gets across and taps it towards mid-off
that was unnecessary! Raina did well to slide and cut it off at short cover but took aim at the batsman's end, the  backup wasn't there and it cost India an overthrow
attempts a pull but he makes contact off the  bottom of the bat and mistimes it
oversteps, he flashes hard at a delivery outside off and misses
Free Hit: That's a low full toss, straight on the off stump and Chibhabha gives it everything and slams it over mid-off's reach
the slower ball, he flashes hard and  gets an outside edge which beats Ojha's dive and third man
gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg
slaps it to extra cover and Raina does well to cut it off
makes room to cut but he slaps it to extra cover again
another hard cut and Kohli does well to dive and deflect it towards backward point
gets down and sweeps towards short fine leg
makes room and pulls hard along the ground to mid-on
no turn, he shuffles and tucks it to the on side
pulls and it drops to deep square leg on the first bounce
tossed up on middle and off, he tries to clear the infield on the on side but the ball dips towards Rohit who jogs back at mid-on, comfortably taken
tucks it to the on side for a single
tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it to the on side
well played, he gets on his knee to a flighed delivery on middle and leg and plays a aerial sweep wide of short fine leg
lands on the off stump and the ball kicks up and hits him  high on the pad, stifled appeal
tucks it to the on side
strays down the leg side and wide called
works it down to short square leg
no turn, he opens the face and dabs it wide of short third man
tossed up on middle and leg and tucked to the on side
clipped towards midwicket, ends a quiet over
comes round the wicket, he gets forward and gently tucks it to short square leg
poor ball, he drops it short outside off and no turn, Chibhabha moves back and slaps it wide of extra cover
steers it towards short third man and doesn't run
makes room and hits it hard through the off side and deep cover runs across and cuts it off
steers it to the on side
tossed up on middle and off and he clips it down to deep midwicket
slow through the air, he moves right across his stumps and tucks it to the on side
gets on his knee and sweeps and there's a top edge but the ball drops short of deep square leg
full on middle and leg and tucked to the on side
no turn,he gets forward and defends
comes forward and defends
stays back and punches it down to long-on
taps it softly towards short cover and Raina at short cover lands forward quickly and releases it but just misses the stumps
tucks it towards midwicket and takes the first run quickly, excellent running
gets forward to defend but the ball kicks up and hits him on the body
turns it towards short midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped to the on side
the googly traps him, Chibhabha gives himself a bit of room but the ball skids through and spins the other way, hits him in front of leg and umpire Tiffen is convinced
turns it to the on side
pushes it back to the bowler
full on middle and leg and pushed through the line to long-on
stays back and punches it towards deep cover
stays back and punches it towards cover
quicker through the air and pushed back to the bowler
slides towards leg and he sweeps fine and beats the keeper, fine leg mops up
stays back and punches towards midwicket
opens the face and dabs it towards point
taps it towards short cover
another appeal! The ball kept low as Ervine tried to pull, hits his pads but the ball may have pitched outside leg
tries to work it to the on side but the ball clips his pads
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to the on side
drops it short and he pulls over midwicket, deep square leg mops up
tries to work it away to the on side
comes down the track and defends
Zimbabwe are losing the plot here, Chigumbura gets on his knee to sweep on seeing the fine leg up, but he gets a top edge and Vijay gets under it at long leg
stays back and places it to the off side
two for the over! Ojha tosses it up on middle and leg, Lamb tries to work it across the line and the ball clips the base of the pad in line with the stumps, straightforward decision
tossed up on middle and off and defends
defends close to the pads and they appeal, missing the stumps
tossed up on middle and leg, he tucks it to the on side
tossed up on the off stump, he goes back and cuts
tucks it towards short fine leg
Ervine can only defend, the spinners are getting on top of him
gets forward and drops it towards short cover and sets off
defends close to the pads, seemed like the carrom ball
gets well forward and defends
comes round the wicket, the ball doesn't turn and it hits his pads, the impact was outside the line of offstump and he can't be given out
punched towards cover
tucked towards short fine leg
gets well forward and pushes it towards long-on
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped to short fine leg
tossed up on the pads and he gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg
tossed up wide outside off and he drives to wide long-off
Ervine gives the charge and checks his shot and ends up dabbing it to point
Chawla gets one to turn away(!) and beats Utseya's prod forward
the googly, he places it to deep cover
gives it a bit more air, he gets on his knee and sweeps in the air to deep square leg
gives room and drives straight to cover
finally breaks the boundary drought! He makes room and drives on the up and wide of extra cover, much needed from Ervine
punches it to extra cover and risks a single to Raina, throw to the bowler's end misses the stumps
punches it down to long-on
slaps it down to cover
turns it to fine leg and they could have taken the second but they were too slow
drops it on a good length and Ervine makes room and cuts hard to deep point, Ashwin slides and fails to cut it off properly, deflects it to the rope
on the blockhole outside off, he digs it out to the bowler
timber! Ervine stays rooted to the crease and doesn't make up his mind on the shot, the ball skids through and knocks the off stump back a few yards
digs it in short and Price mistimes the pull, the ball lands in between midwicket and the fielder in the deep
makes room and slaps it straight to cover
off stump goes for a spin again! Dinda swings it in and fires it on the blockhole, Price fails to dig it out, the off stump lands a couple of yards back
full on middle and leg and he clips it towards midwicket
he tries to whip him across the line, the ball hits his pads and rolls to the off side, Rainsford sets off and the the throw hits the stumps at the striker's end but Utseya's home
yorker again! Vinay Kumar was dead accurate with this yorker and Utseya made himself some room but couldn't dig it out, the ball hits middle and off
he squeezes out a full pitched delivery towards long-on
full on the off stump and hoicked towards long-on
makes room and slashes it towards deep cover, fumble by Kohli allows the second run
